thread.section_title: Luxy Hair Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Luxy Hair | www.luxyhair.com
thread.title: Kayla Nelson
thread.title_full: Luxy Hair reviewed by Kayla Nelson

author: Kayla Nelson
title: Kayla Nelson
text: I originally bought the chesnut brown color but then a week later loved them so much I bought the ombre' set. I now mix the two and can say I get so many compliments! Extremely easy to put in and look so natural. Also, the customer service is amazing! Fast and informational and I love that they offer videos to help you with any questions you might have! I will continue to buy Luxy!
